title: Ocean Spray CEO on Adapting During Pandemic
itunes:title: Ocean Spray CEO on Adapting During Pandemic
description:
Ocean Spray CEO Tom Hayes talks about launching new products and managing the pandemic.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
